item.description:
June Conscious Movie: Pay It Forward

Friday, June 12th• 7:30 p.m.

If you have ever walked out of a movie theater affected by a powerful film, movie nights at the Center of Light are for you! These events provide a way for people to talk about inspiring movies on a deeper level and how they affect our lives, our attitudes, our perceptions. It’s also a great opportunity to meet like-minded people!

Movie Description: Inspired by an assignment from his teacher, a young boy attempts to make the world a better place by doing good deeds for three strangers, paying them “forward” instead of paying someone back.

Hope to see you there.

This meetup is free, but donations are welcome.
item.how_to_find_us: We're just around the corner from the Stony Brook T-stop on the Orange line.
item.name: Conscious Movie: Pay It Forward
